attributes.action: Stop the mouth breathers and window lickers creating moronic Prime Minister petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All it needs is a short trawl through the petitions on this site to come across countless moronic, poorly worded, bidly spolled, badly thought out and idiotic petitions.
These people should be stopped.
It 
a) devalues the benefit of this site
b) means this fantastic and meaningful petition will get lost in the dross

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
